text: This is an incredible place to deepen your understanding of God and foster a closer relationship with Him. The availability of part-time studies makes it ideal for those juggling full-time work. I wholeheartedly recommend this theology school for anyone seeking a profound and comprehensive knowledge of the Bible.
Promotes Jesuits and Ignatian / Contemplative Spirituality (Finding God in All Things). If u know what those terms are and have researched on them...
